snippet.title: Arsene Lupin – Once A Thief – Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Step into the shoes of the legendary gentleman thief with Arsene Lupin: Once a Thief Master the art of thievery, solve puzzles and relive the iconic tales of Maurice Leblanc. Outsmart the law, unravel mysteries and discover the adventures that forged Lupin's legend.

Play now:
On Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2922980/Arsene_Lupin__Once_a_Thief
On PlayStation Store: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10011109
On GOG : https://www.gog.com/game/arsene_lupin_once_a_thief
On EGS: https://store.epicgames.com/p/arsene-lupin-once-a-thief-825852
On Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-us/games/store/arsene-lupin-once-a-thief/9P0VF2M3FXDD

Arsene Lupin – Once A Thief will be available in 2024 on Steam, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Playstation 4 and Xbox One.

Dive into the captivating world of Arsene Lupin, the legendary gentleman-thief, with Arsene Lupin – Once A Thief.

Developed by Blazing Griffin, ‘Arsene Lupin’ promises a diverse, vibrant, and humor-filled adventure 🔍🌟

Explore the evolution of this iconic character through daring heists, spectacular escapes, intriguing investigations, and a touch of romance.

#arsenelupin #adventure #gaming #thief 

Website: https://www.microids.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Microids_off
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/microids/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/microids_official/
TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@microids
